text: nampikkai koṇṭavarkaḷāyiṉum, yūtarkaḷāyiṉum, kiṟistavarkaḷāyiṉum, sāpiyīṉkaḷāyiṉum evarkaḷ allāhvaiyum, iṟuti nāḷaiyum uṇmaiyākavē nampikkaikoṇṭu naṟceyalkaḷaic ceykiṟārkaḷō avarkaḷuṭaiya kūli avarkaḷuṭaiya iṟaivaṉiṭattil avarkaḷukku niccayamāka uṇṭu. Mēlum, avarkaḷukku evvitap payamum illai. Avarkaḷ tukkappaṭavum māṭṭārkaḷ
